item.title: Use One Mouse-Keyboard On Two Systems
item.description: Brief Barrier is an open-source software application that allows many computers to share a mouse and keyboard. I’m controlling a Windows machine with a Debian-based machine. Installing Barrier Barrier must be installed on both the Windows and Debian-based machines before it can be used. The most recent version of Barrier can be downloaded from the official website here. Installing Barrier on Windows To install Barrier on Windows, follow these steps:
